questions.text: 🤓 Questions about the website and projects
answers: Anything in particular you want to ask?
I used HTML, CSS, Vue.js for the this website and React.js for the simple games project

questions.text: 🖥️ Any other tech did you use?
answers: I used Firebase to create a simple backend for my game website
I used Vite for build tool. Much better than web pack. Highly recommended.
I'm thinking of making a chatroom or an online game website.
I'm curious how data is stored and transfered in real time between users.
My favorite sites: Youtube, Stackoverflow, MDN
I'm working on the direct message function
In the meantime. Hope you don't mind leaving me a message on LinkedIn
